entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:35 PM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 90. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
